basics.name: Payton Higa
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.A. in Information & Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: Manoa Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen who have a GPA of 3.8 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: Mānoa Dean's List
awards.awarder: University of Hawaii at Mānoa Honors Program
awards.summary: Undergraduate students who earn a semester grade point average of 3.5 or higher.
